exceptions.exn: In environment n : nat P : list (mm_instr (pos n)) i : nat x : pos n s : nat * vec nat n v : vec nat n H : (i, DECₐ x (1 + i) :: DECₐ x i :: nil) <sc (1, P) Hsc : list (mm_instr (pos n)) e : exists r : list (mm_instr (pos n)), P = Hsc ++ (DECₐ x (1 + i) :: DECₐ x i :: nil) ++ r /\\ i = 1 + length Hsc Hs : H = ex_intro (fun l : list (mm_instr (pos n)) => exists r : list (mm_instr (pos n)), P = l ++ (DECₐ x (1 + i) :: DECₐ x i :: nil) ++ r /\\ i = 1 + length l) Hsc e H1 : s = (i, v) Heq : v#>x = 0 Hterm : (1, P) // s ↓ Unable to unify "(1, P) // ?M1459 ↓ -> False" with "False".

In environment n : nat P : list (mm_instr (pos n)) i : nat x : pos n s : nat * vec nat n v : vec nat n H : (i, DECₐ x (1 + i) :: DECₐ x i :: nil) <sc (1, P) Hsc : list (mm_instr (pos n)) e : exists r : list (mm_instr (pos n)), P = Hsc ++ (DECₐ x (1 + i) :: DECₐ x i :: nil) ++ r /\\ i = 1 + length Hsc Hs : H = ex_intro (fun l : list (mm_instr (pos n)) => exists r : list (mm_instr (pos n)), P = l ++ (DECₐ x (1 + i) :: DECₐ x i :: nil) ++ r /\\ i = 1 + length l) Hsc e H2 : s = (1 + i, v) Heq : v#>x = 0 Hterm : (1, P) // s ↓ Unable to unify "(1, P) // ?M3541 ↓ -> False" with "False".

original: destruct 1 as [Hsc] eqn:Hs. intros [H1 | H2]. - intros Heq Hterm. apply mm_self_loop_no_term_1 with (i:=i) (v:=v); auto. - intros Heq Hterm. apply mm_self_loop_no_term_1 with (i:=1 + i) (v:=v); auto.
